name.str_sp: XL South Gate Station Security Uniform

description: The standard and uniformly dull blue uniform worn by most members of the South Gate Station security detail. Often associated with bravery, or a quick death.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A rather lightweight armor protecting user's vital torso area, in addition to some arm protection. This armor is made of cave hopper leather. .  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str_sp: XL South Gate Station security vest

description: A nylon vest equipped with several pouches for magazine and ammunition storage. Comes pre-equipped with several light ballistic plates that provide a small modicum of protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A helmet made from plates of steel with a visor of ballistic glass. Made for use in tandem with underrail metal armor.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
